      • setAceModeInRelationToCard

        public void setAceModeInRelationToCard(Card c)
        Applies only if the card is an ace. Adjusts denomination to 1 or 10 in relation to the card supplied. Must be reset using resetAceMode() once intended usage is done in order to prepare card for other ops. e.g. being matched against another card.
        Parameters:
        c -
